participant_1.background:
I like to watch old tap dance videos and practice my moves.
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
I'm secretly a huge fan of romantic comedies, even though my parents would never approve.
I have no siblings, but I do have a few friends who love to come over and try my new coffee flavors.
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.

I'm not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do enjoy being alone and watching comedies.
i like to go to the opera.
my eyes are bright blue.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.
she died when i was 18.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write stories and watch old tap dance videos.
I love to watch comedies! What kind of stories do you write?
I write stories that transport my readers to another world.
Wow, that sounds really interesting. What inspired you to start writing?
I have always loved to read and I wanted to create something that would make other people feel the same way.
That's a great reason to start writing. I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thank you. I try my best.
Do you have any published works?
I have a few short stories published online.
That's great! I would love to read some of them.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to reading them.
